page.title: 10A Day In The Life Of Fiona 1
page.content: Fiona aged nine lives in Orlingbury and goes to school in Little Harrowden each day .We asked her how she spent a typical day." I get up at 7.30.a.m.I have a wash and go down stairs for breakfast .After breakfast I go and dress for school." "At 8.10 I leave the house to go and wait for the school bus on the green." "When I arrive at school I wait in the playground until school starts." "After assembly lessons begin, first we have maths and then silent reading." "After play I had mental arithmetic then we wrote our spellings down." "At 12.00 we had dinner." "After dinner we had art and then we had playtime,"We wrote a story after play and at 4.00pm school finished and I caught the bus home." Fiona told us that she watched television until 5.00 when she had tea.
